item.description:
Hello Boston Chihuahua Lovers!

 

The date was changed this month because of the snow we got. The venue confirmed for the last Sunday of the month, feb 24 (they were not available the 17th). Sorry for the inconveniences and I really do hope you all can make it. Please update your attendance if you can't. -Aimee 2/11/13 I hope you guys had a good time for January's meet. February will be 2 hours again, you can come and go or stay the entire time. Hope to get a good crowd again! As always, dogs should be up to date on vaccinations- no paperwork required.

 

Some information about the venue

Red Dog Pet Resort & Spa is Boston’s newest 43,000 sq ft. pet boarding facility offering the ultimate pet experience providing care for your pet like it is one of our own.

 

 

Red Dog’s state-of-the art facility offers:

  • 24/7 on site professional staffing
  • A wide array of boarding options, including luxury theme suites
  • An indoor Aquatic Center & Daycare
  • Animal Pickup & Delivery
  • Grooming & Spa Services
  • Chiropractic Care
  • Veterinary Services
  • Retail

For more information, please visit www.bostonreddog.com

 

 

Hope to see you all there!

-Aimee
item.name: Indoor Meet @ Boston Red Dog-- UPDATED
